thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Trump Trade
President Trump’s pledge to impose stiff tariffs on steel and aluminum imports sparked trade-war worries, sent stocks tumbling, triggered protests from American industries and lawmakers on Capitol Hill and prompted threats of retaliation across the world. The pledge fulfills a campaign promise that helped fuel Mr. Trump’s surprise 2016 campaign victory in the industrial Midwest. In a White House meeting with business executives, Mr. Trump said his coming measures—25% tariffs on steel imports, 10% on...
